action.primary: Removes Wind, reduces Heat, promotes the circulation of Qi, invigorates the Blood and resolves swelling

indications: Common cold, fever, headache, vomiting, diarrhea, bacillary dysentery, enteritis, mastitis, furuncle, external and internal trauma, functional uterine bleeding, measles, sore throat, snake and insect bites, urticaria, erysipelas, diphtherias, abdominal pain due to Food Stagnation
